{{ player.shirtNo }} {{ player.name }} {{ player.positionName }} {{ player.appearances }} {{ player.goals }} {{ player.goalsPerMatch }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-player', templateUrl: './player.component.html' }) export class PlayerComponent { public players: Player[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'api/player').subscribe(result => { this.players = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } } interface Player { id: number; name: string; shirtNo: number; appearances: number; goals: number; positionName: number; goalsPerMatch: number; }
